text:
Detox the Mind
Rajinder Singh
In this inspirational book and audiobook, Detox the Mind, Rajinder Singh provides a step-by-step journey for you, along with engaging exercises, so you can take this at your own pace and discover a joyful, wondrous and peaceful daily life.
Picture your life free from stress, anxiety, fear, and depression.
Imagine waking up each day filled with peace and joy.
Millions have used meditation, discovering how to replace stress with relaxation and happiness.
Through mental detoxification, you can remove blockages that keep you from the happiness you deserve.
You have nothing to lose and everything to gain by committing to taking this first step to your well-being.
All Books
Inner and Outer Peace through Meditation, by Rajinder Singh
Easy-to-read meditation handbook and audiobook will help you achieve personal transformation. As a result, you can contribute to outer peace and the raising of the global consciousness.
ISBN: 978-0-918224-53-8
Empowering Your Soul through Meditation, by Rajinder Singh
Empowering Your Soul through Meditation by Rajinder Singh explores the power and energy of the soul that is within everyone. He teaches how we can find it through meditation on the inner Light and Sound and how we can use it to transform our lives. It awakens readers to the “empowered soul” and its rich qualities such as unlimited wisdom, fearlessness, immortality, unconditional love, connectedness, and bliss. Rajinder Singh provides simple meditation techniques for accessing the riches of each person’s soul so that each reader can discover his or her great potential and purpose in life.
ISBN: 978-0-918224-54-5
En Español
El poder sanador de la meditación, by Rajinder Singh
Imagine que camina con un retiro privado guardado dentro de usted. Un santuario donde puede descansar cuando la vida lo agobia. Imagine la satisfacción plena y la libertad del temor —cada vez que la desea—. Lo que está imaginando es la paz de cuerpo, mente y alma, proporcionada por la meditación.
ISBN: 978-0-91822-60-8
Descubriendo el poder del alma por medio de la meditación, by Rajinder Singh
Este libro explora el poder y la energía del alma que yace dentro de todos y cómo podemos usarla para transformer nuestras vidas. Despierta al lector al conocimiento del “alma dotada de poder” y a sus ricas cualidades, tales como: sabiduría ilimitada, valentía, inmortalidad, amor incondicional, conexión y bienaventuranza.
ISBN: 978-0-918224-30-9
In German
Heilende Meditation
Das große spirituelle Lebenshilfebuch über Bedeutung und Praxis der Meditation. Rajinder Singh zeigt gerade den modernen Lesern, wie ein spirituelles Bewusstsein zu erlangen ist. Seine zentrale Botschaft: Glück lässt sich nicht erzwingen, der „Garten der Seligkeit“ liegt in uns selbst. Erst durch Meditation treten wir in Kontakt mit unserem unsterblichen, göttlichen Selbst. Sie hilft uns, inneren und äußeren Frieden zu finden und den Alltag besser zu meistern.
